T04sanss15u:5: iha gṛhapate gṛhī bodhisatvo dharmeṇa bhogān paryeṣate nâdharmeṇa /
T04sanss15u:9: na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvêryāpatham āracayati /
T04sanss15u:11: na śanair mandaṃ mandaṃ kramān utkṣipati na nikṣipati yugamātraprekṣikayā saviśva-
T04sanss15u:16: na bodhisatvo lābhahetor lābhanidānaṃ mandabhāṇī mṛdubhāṇī na priyabhāṇī bhavati /
T04sanss15u:19: bodhisatvo dāyakena dānapatinā vā lābhena pravāryamāṇo vā câlpêcchatāṃ darśayati /
T04sanss15u:21: antardāhâiṣa kulaputra yad vācâlpêcchatā cittena lābhakāmatā /
T04sanss15u:22: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisatvaḥ kuhanalapanalābhâpagato bhavati / pe /
T04sanss15u:23: na bodhisatvo dānapatiṃ vā dṛṣṭvā nimittaṃ karoti /
T04sanss15u:27: na ca taṃ dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ vā kiṃcit prārthayate /
T04sanss15u:30: yāvan na bodhisatvo dāyakaṃ dānapatiṃ dṛṣṭvâivaṃ vācaṃ niścārayati /
T04sanss15u:33: kena vā me dānapatinâmukaṃ vastu pratipāditaṃ tasya ca mayâmukôpakāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
T04sanss15u:34: tena me śīlavān ayam iti kṛtvêdaṃ cêdaṃ ca dattaṃ bahuśrutêti /
T04sanss15u:36: mayā ca tasya kāruṇyacittam upasthāpya parigṛhītaṃ /
T04sanss15u:38: tatra kāyakṣatir yad uta lābhahetor lābhanidānam ādhāvanaparidhāvanaṃ dauḥśīlyasamudācaraṇaṃ ca /
T04sanss15u:44: iha bodhisatvo na tulākūṭena na mānakūṭena na visraṃbhaghātikayā na dhūrtatayā lābham upārjayati /
T04sanss15u:46: ye te lābhā staupikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā dhārmikasaṃsṛṣṭā vā sāṃghikasaṃsṛṣṭā vâdattā vânanujñātā vā /
T04sanss15u:53: mātāpitṛmitrâmātyajñātisālohitebhyaḥ kālânukālam ātmanā paribhuṅkte paribhuñjānaś câraktaḥ paribhuṅkte /
T04sanss15u:54: svanadhyavasito na câlabhyamāne lābhe khedacittam utpādayati /
T04sanss15u:55: na paritapyati na ca dāyakadānapatīnām antike 'prasādacittam utpādayatîty ādi //
T04sanss15u:56: tatrâiṣâpy asya bodhisatvasya bhogaśuddhir ātmabhāvaśuddhivat parahitāya bhavet //
T04sanss15u:58: punar aparaṃ bhadanta śāriputra ye praviśantîdaṃ gṛhaṃ teṣāṃ samanantarapraviṣṭānāṃ sarvakleśā na bādhante 'yaṃ dvitīyâścaryâdbhuto dharmaḥ
T04sanss15u:60: atha tato bhojanāt sarvāvatī sā parṣat tṛptā bhūtā /
T04sanss15u:62: yaiś ca bodhisatvaiḥ śrāvakaiś ca śakrabrahmalokapālais tad anyaiś ca satvais tad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ tā-
T04sanss15u:67: sarvaromakūpebhyaś ca teṣāṃ tādṛśo gandhaḥ pravāti /
T04sanss15u:68: tad yathâpi nāma tasyām eva sarvagandhasugandhāyāṃ lokadhātau vṛkṣāṇāṃ gandhaḥ //
T04sanss15u:70: yaiś ca bhadantânanda bhikṣubhir anavakrāntaniyāmair etad bhojanaṃ bhuktaṃ teṣām evâvakrāntaniyamānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati / pe /
T04sanss15u:71: yair anutpāditabodhicittaiḥ satvaiḥ paribhuktaṃ teṣām utpāditabodhicittānāṃ pariṇaṃsyati /
T04sanss15u:72: yair utpāditabodhicittair bhuktaṃ teṣāṃ nâpratilabdhakṣāntikānāṃ pariṇaṃsyatîti vistaraḥ //
T04sanss15u:82: yathā gaganaṃ samaviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti // pe /
T04sanss15u:83: yathā gaganam aparyantam evam aparyantīkṛtena cittena tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanss15u:84: yathā gaganaṃ vistīrṇam anāvaraṇam evaṃ bodhipariṇāmitaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanss15u:85: yathā gaganam arūpi evaṃ sarvarūpâniśritaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanss15u:88: evam asaṃjñi asaṃskṛtam avijñaptilakṣaṇam evam apratijñānaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanss15u:89: yathā gaganaṃ sarvabuddhakṣetraspharaṇam evaṃ sarvasatvamaitrīspharaṇaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti / pe /
T04sanss15u:90: yathā gaganaṃ sadāprakāśam evaṃ cittaprakṛtiviśuddhaṃ tad dānaṃ dada-ti /
T04sanss15u:91: yathā gaganaṃ sarvasatvâvakāśaṃ evaṃ sarvasatvôpajīvyaṃ tad dānaṃ dadāti /
T04sanss15u:92: yāvad yathā nirmito nirmitāya dadāti nirvikalpo 'nābhogaḥ /
T04sanss15u:101: evaṃ tyāgacittaḥ kulaputra bodhisatvo gaganasamadāno bhavati //
T04sanss15u:106: nâsti nikrandadānaṃ yāvan nâsti yācanakeṣûpataptadānaṃ nâsty uccagghana*ullāpanadānaṃ nâsti parāṅmukhadānaṃ nâsty apaviddhadānaṃ nâsty asvahastadānaṃ / pe /
T04sanss15u:108: nâsty akāladānaṃ nâsti viṣaśastradānaṃ nâsti satvaviheṭhanādānam iti //
T04sanss15u:114: madyapānād api nairāśyakṛte bodhisatve pratigho garīyān /
T04sanss15u:115: satvasaṃgrahahāniś câto 'nyaprasādanôpāyâsaṃbhave madyaṃ deyam ity abhiprāyaḥ /
T04sanss15u:116: śastrâdiṣv api yady anubadhagurulâdyavavicārād dānam āpadyeta /
T04sanss15u:129: yāvad achedyâbhedyaṃ gaganam achedyâbhedyaṃ tacchīlam ity ādi //
T04sanss15u:131: samaprayogaṃ gaganaṃ sarvasatvasamacittasya kṣāntipariśuddhir ity ādi //
T04sanss15u:139: na kalpo na vikalpo na parikalpaḥ //
T04sanss15u:140: yâivaṃ kṣāntir iyaṃ bodhisatvasya paramā gaganasamā kṣāntir /
T04sanss15u:171: yāvad iyaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitā caryāpariśuddhir iti //
T04sanss15u:175: saddharmacakrapravartanamahāparinirvāṇasaṃdarśanagocaraś ca bodhisatvacaryâtyajanagocaraś câyam api bodhisatvasya gocara /
